remarks: Suppose ` X ` is a non-principal Dirichlet character with ` sum_ n e. NN , X ( n ) / n = 0 ` .  Then ` X ` is a real character. Part of Lemma 9.4.4 of [Shapiro], p. 382.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2016.)

rpvmasum2.w $e |- W = { y e. ( D \ { .1. } ) | sum_ m e. NN ( ( y ` ( L ` m ) ) / m ) = 0 } $.
